title: The FINAL FLIGHT ..
body_text:
Select a flight, purchase a ticket. Board the plane and fasten your seatbelt - you're in for the ride of your life. The engine starts, the ascension begins, and top speed peaks. Your
Final Destination
awaits.
The six-year phenomenon
East Coast Dodgeball
invites you on one last journey, and here's why ...
The "FINAL DESTINATION" Top Four
4) The Passengers
: You just never know who's gonna end up sitting beside you.
ECDElitists
Kevin Megill, Lauren Stopa, Justin Wolf? Reigning
RIMshot Contest
Champion Kayla Knott? The Writer perhaps?
3) The View
: Just one quick glance down below is all you need to capture the magnificently-illuminated Wall High School battlegrounds. It really is a sight to see.
2) The Ride
: A little turbelence only heightens the thrills .. and spills. The unpredictability of it all makes this specific destination that much more memorable.
1) The Destination
: This just may be it, for good. Will this be the joy ride that flies into the sunset? Well, just be on the safe side - snag your golden ticket because you never know when it'll be your last.
________________________________________
_____________________________
ECD
presents the grand finale of 2011 with
FINAL DESTINATION
, presented live Friday, November 25, emanating from the Wall High School tennis courts beginning at 5:00pm.
body_html:
Select a flight, purchase a ticket. Board the plane and fasten your seatbelt - you're in for the ride of your life. The engine starts, the ascension begins, and top speed peaks. Your Final Destination awaits.

The six-year phenomenon East Coast Dodgeball invites you on one last journey, and here's why ...

The "FINAL DESTINATION" Top Four

  • 4) The Passengers: You just never know who's gonna end up sitting beside you. ECDElitists Kevin Megill, Lauren Stopa, Justin Wolf? Reigning RIMshot Contest Champion Kayla Knott? The Writer perhaps?

  • 3) The View: Just one quick glance down below is all you need to capture the magnificently-illuminated Wall High School battlegrounds. It really is a sight to see.

  • 2) The Ride: A little turbelence only heightens the thrills .. and spills. The unpredictability of it all makes this specific destination that much more memorable.

  • 1) The Destination: This just may be it, for good. Will this be the joy ride that flies into the sunset? Well, just be on the safe side - snag your golden ticket because you never know when it'll be your last.

    _____________________________________________________________________


    ECD presents the grand finale of 2011 with FINAL DESTINATION, presented live Friday, November 25, emanating from the Wall High School tennis courts beginning at 5:00pm.
